metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3643 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
usb-creator before 0.2.38.3ubuntu0.1 on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, before0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, before 0.2.62ubuntu0.3 on Ubuntu14.10, and before 0.2.67ubuntu0.1 on Ubuntu 15.04 allows local users togain privileges by leveraging a missing call check_polkit for the KVMTestmethod.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3643` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

usb-creator-common - 0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1
usb-creator-gtk - 0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1
usb-creator-kde - 0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: usb-creator package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.56.3ubuntu0.1').
